hero.title: Geometry
hero.subtitle: The mathematics of space and shape. Explore figures, transformations, and spatial relationships.

content.text: Basic algebra and understanding of coordinate systems. Intuitive understanding of space and shape.
Upon completing this course, you will be able to:

items: Understand and work with geometric figures and their properties

content.text: Points, lines, and planes. Angles and angle relationships. Parallel and perpendicular lines.
Triangle properties. Congruence criteria. Triangle theorems and applications.
Properties of polygons. Circle theorems. Inscribed and circumscribed figures.
Measuring two-dimensional and three-dimensional figures. Surface area and volume calculations.
Translations, rotations, reflections. Symmetry and patterns. Similarity and dilation.
The coordinate plane. Distance and midpoint formulas. Slopes and lines. Introduction to analytic geometry.

items: Geometry Revisited by H. S. M. Coxeter and S. L. Greitzer

content.text: Have questions about geometry? Join our discussion forum to ask for help and explore geometric ideas with others.
